section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on February 22, 2026.*
section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of this title, may issue rules governing interactive wayfinding kiosks in the District, including rules related to their design, placement, and component parts.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 2-1228.04, see § 2214 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2214 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
